remarks: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
statement:
rlimeq.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
rlimeq.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
rlimeq.3 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
rlimeq.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ D <_ x ) ) -> B = C ) $.
rlimeq $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) ~~>r E <-> ( x e. A |-> C ) ~~>r E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
